meta.title: AI Academic Research Reading App: AI Literature Search Tool; 250 M+ Research Papers | R Discovery

meta.name: title
meta.content: AI Academic Research Reading App: AI Literature Search Tool; 250 M+ Research Papers | R Discovery

meta.name: description
meta.content: R Discovery is the best AI academic research reading app and AI literature search tool with the largest scholarly content repository. Access 250M+ research papers, 40 M+ open access free research papers, 8M+ research summaries and highlights, 3M+ pre-prints, 32K+ journals, and 9.5M research topics.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Academic Research, Research Discovery, personalised research discovery, scholarly articles, research database
Academic Research Reading: Personalised Research Discovery - R Discovery

Make academic research reading a happy habit with R Discovery. Take the search out of research and get access to all the research papers you need in your preferred research subjects. Personalised research discovery with precise and fast paper suggestions. Join us and download our app today!

meta.name: twitter:title
meta.content: Academic Research Reading: Personalised Research Discovery - R Discovery

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Make academic research reading a happy habit with R Discovery. Take the search out of research and get access to all the research papers you need in your preferred research subjects. Personalised research discovery with precise and fast paper suggestions. Join us and download our app today!

div.p: Please check if the URL you have entered is correct; you may also choose to return to the Home page or contact our support team by clicking the button below

img.alt: Scan QR code to download FREE App

div.p: Your insights are needed to transform us into a better research content provider for researchers.
Copyright 2026 Cactus Communications. All rights reserved.

body.noscript: Please enable JavaScript to continue using this application.
body.script: {"/discovery/search/footer.json":{"data":[{"title":"Popular topics","list":[{"display_label":"Latest Artificial Intelligence papers","path":"search","query_params":{"search":"Artificial papers","path":"search","query_params":{"search":"Nursing","document_type":"article","sort":"publication_date:desc"}},{"display_label":"Latest Psychology Research Reduction||Racism||Religion||Rural","document_type":"article","sort":"publication_date:desc"}},{"display_label":"Research on No Poverty","path":"search","query_params":{"concepts":"Basic Services||Economic Resources||Environmental||Financial Inclusion||Income Inequality||Low-income Families||Low-income Households||Poor||Poor People||Poverty Line||Quality Of Life||Resources||Social Protection||Sustainable","document_type":"article","sort":"publication_date:desc"}},{"display_label":"Research on Gender Equality","path":"search","query_params":{"concepts":"Domestic Violence||Discrimination||Empowerment||Equal Opportunity||Gender||Gender Bias||Gender Inequality||Human Rights||Maternal Health||Sex Education||Sexual Exploitation||Social Inclusion||Universal Health Coverage||Violence||Women","document_type":"article","sort":"publication_date:desc"}},{"display_label":"Research on Peace Justice & Strong Institutions","path":"search","query_params":{"concepts":"Abuse||Child Welfare||Conflict Resolution||Crime||Decision-making||Environmental Management||Governance||Institutions||Justice||Physical Abuse||Rule Of Law||Security Threats||Sexual Abuse||Water Management","document_type":"article","sort":"publication_date:desc"}},{"display_label":"Research on Affordable & Clean Energy","path":"search","query_params":{"concepts":"Carbon||Energy||Energy Demand||Energy Efficiency||Energy Harvesting||Greenhouse Gas Emissions||Photovoltaic||Photovoltaic on Quality Education","path":"search","query_params":{"concepts":"Cultural Diversity||Early Childhood||Education||Gender Equality||International Cooperation||Learning Environment||Learning COVID-19","path":"covid-research"},{"display_label":"Research on Monkeypox","path":"monkeypox-research-collection"},{"display_label":"Research on Medical Specialties","path":"medical-specialties-and-healthcare-research-papers"},{"display_label":"Research on Climate Justice","path":"climate-justice-collection"}]}]}}
